metadata.title: CVE-2024-32621 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: HDF5 Library through 1.14.3 contains a heap-based buffer overflow inH5HG_read in H5HG.c (called from H5VL__native_blob_get inH5VLnative_blob.c), resulting in the corruption of the instruction pointer.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
